text: May 27, 2018 / 5:19 PM / Updated 39 minutes ago IPL Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read May 27 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of final between Chennai Super Kings and Sunrisers Hyderabad on Sunday at Mumbai, India Chennai Super Kings win by 8 wickets Sunrisers Hyderabad 1st innings Shreevats Goswami Run Out Karn Sharma 5 Shikhar Dhawan b Ravindra Jadeja 26 Kane Williamson st MS Dhoni b Karn Sharma 47 Shakib Al Hasan c Suresh Raina b Dwayne Bravo 23 Yusuf Pathan Not Out 45 Deepak Hooda c (Sub) b Lungi Ngidi 3 Carlos Brathwaite c Ambati Rayudu b Shardul Thakur 21 Extras 0b 1lb 1nb 0pen 6w 8 Total (20.0 overs) 178-6 Fall of Wickets : 1-13 Goswami, 2-64 Dhawan, 3-101 Williamson, 4-133 Al Hasan, 5-144 Hooda, 6-178 Brathwaite Did Not Bat : Khan, Kumar, Kaul, Sharma Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Deepak Chahar 4 0 25 0 6.25 1w 1nb Lungi Ngidi 4 1 26 1 6.50 Shardul Thakur 3 0 31 1 10.33 2w Karn Sharma 3 0 25 1 8.33 1w Dwayne Bravo 4 0 46 1 11.50 2w Ravindra Jadeja 2 0 24 1 12.00 Chennai Super Kings 1st innings Shane Watson Not Out 117 Faf du Plessis c&b Sandeep Sharma 10 Suresh Raina c Shreevats Goswami b Carlos Brathwaite 32 Ambati Rayudu Not Out 16 Extras 0b 3lb 0nb 0pen 3w 6 Total (18.3 overs) 181-2 Fall of Wickets : 1-16 du Plessis, 2-133 Raina Did Not Bat : Dhoni, Bravo, Jadeja, Chahar, Sharma, Thakur, Ngidi Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Bhuvneshwar Kumar 4 1 17 0 4.25 Sandeep Sharma 4 0 52 1 13.00 2w Siddarth Kaul 3 0 43 0 14.33 Rashid Khan 4 1 24 0 6.00 Shakib Al Hasan 1 0 15 0 15.00 Carlos Brathwaite 2.3 0 27 1 10.80 1w Umpire Sundaram Ravi Umpire Marais Erasmus Video Nitin Menon Match Referee Andrew Pycroft
